item.description:
This meetup will feature an introduction to NuoDB.

 

------------- Logistics -------------

MIT's map with the building (32) highlighted: http://whereis.mit.edu/?go=32

MIT's map with the Kendall square T stop highlighted: http://whereis.mit.edu/?selection=L5&Landmarks=go (the stop is in red on that map, and you can see Building 32 to the left)

MIT's map with parking lot information: http://whereis.mit.edu/map-jpg?selection=P5... There is also plentiful on-street parking (check the meters, some meters go until 8 pm in Cambridge).

Note that MIT lots are free to park in after 3 pm or so, even if it says "reserved for faculty"

Free pizza and soda will be served, so please RSVP accurately.

To RSVP anonymously, please login to the Meetup site with the e-mail address "admin at sheeri dot com" and the password "guest". For more information, see: http://www.meetup.com/mysqlbos/calendar/



 

Free pizza and soda will be served, so please RSVP accurately.

 

To RSVP anonymously, please login to the Meetup site with the e-mail address "admin at sheeri dot com" and the password "guest".

 

For more information, see: http://www.meetup.com/mysqlbos/calendar/
item.name: The Boston MySQL Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
